name: Marsh: Against the Shadows [DEMO] (Version 1.1)
description:
(DISCLAIMER: This is only a demo on what's to come, this will be expanded in the future)

Marsh wakes up in a unfamiliar place, what seems to be a dungeon.

Traverse through shadow enemies and obstacles, collectibles leading to secrets, the darkness isn't your friend...

Includes:

- Awesome platforming action

- A mysterious vibe

- Puzzle-like mechanics

- Amazing soundtrack by SynoDraws

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:

Download and unzip the .zip file and play away!

This is highly based on the MarshMations channel (go sub pls)

Made by DusTV
